recipes.title: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.instructions: 1. Cook the spaghetti according to package instructions. 2. Heat olive oil in a pan and sauté onions and garlic. 3. Add ground beef and cook until browned. 4. Pour in the canned tomatoes and simmer for 15 minutes. 5. Season with salt and pepper. 6. Serve the sauce over the spaghetti.

recipes.title: Chicken Tikka Masala
recipes.instructions: 1. Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka masala paste for 1 hour. 2. Sauté onions in a pan, add chicken, and cook until browned. 3. Add canned tomatoes and simmer for 10 minutes. 4. Stir in coconut milk and cook for 5 more minutes. Serve with rice.
